nodes.text: A secret Imperial detention center remained in the planet Coruscant for years after the Galactic Empire lost control of the world. It was the home of the IT-3 Interrogator droid "It", who was reprogrammed by a slicer droid to take down the New Republic after they established Coruscant as their base of power. "It" led a group of underdwellers in stealing a datapad from New Republic Senator Leia Organa Solo, but was followed back to the detention center by the Wookiees Chewbacca, Mallatobuck, and Lumpawaroo and ultimately destroyed by them.
